text: Bruce Alexander Grenfell Murray (18 September 1940 â€“ 10 January 2023) was a New Zealand cricketer. He played 13 Tests from 1968 to 1971. He also played for Wellington in the Plunket Shield. Murray refused to play on Sundays for religious reasons. He was the grandfather of cricketers Amelia Kerr and Jess Kerr. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2023 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers
title: Bruce Murray (cricketer)
